title: Seed Flow
body:
Industrial growth mined the planet.

Digital growth mines the mind.

GDP rises whenever we monetize the unpriced.

Progress is just the extraction of whatever wasnâ€™t protected.


[Feeds, Feelings, and Focus](https://psycnet.apa.org/fulltext/2026-89350-001.html)

title: When tackling problems
body:
When tackling problems:

- Incentives? Microeconomics.  
- Interactions? Game theory.  
- Irrational urges? Evolution.  
- Unprecedented puzzles? First principles.  
- Tough judgments? Inversionâ€”spot the dead ends first.  
- Shaky theories? Falsifiability.  
- Teams? Principal-agent traps.  
- Overwhelm? Munger's latticework of models.  

Clear thinking is a superpower. Build it.

title: Biohack the mind
body:
Hack your brain chemistry:

Stress â†’ Cortisol â†’ Walk it off.
Pain â†’ Endorphins â†’ Run through it.
Fatigue â†’ Dopamine â†’ Cold shower.
Sadness/Anger â†’ Serotonin â†’ Fruit or music.
Insomnia â†’ Melatonin â†’ Sunlight.
Overthinking â†’ Awareness â†’ Mindfulness.
Fear/Anxiety â†’ Adrenaline/GABA â†’ Breathe or meditate.
Laziness/Procrastination â†’ Adrenaline/Dopamine â†’ HIIT or tiny wins now.
Seven happiness hormones:â€¨Dopamine: Eat, achieve, sleep, soak.
Endorphins: Move hard.
Serotonin: Sun, rhythm, real food.
Oxytocin: Hug, talk, love.
GABA: Think, relax body.
PEA: Fall in love.
ACh: Learn something new.

Biohack the mind.
